abstract.t: This document describes procedures that can be used to deliver MPLSservices over Layer 3 Virtual Private Networks (L3VPN). Using theseprocedures, a VPN customer can signal MPLS Label Switched Paths (LSP)from Customer Edge (CE) router to CE router. Although a ServiceProvider (SP) network carries the Customer LSP (C-LSP) from one CErouter to another, the C-LSP does not interact with the SP network'srouting or signaling infrastructure.
